full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Breathable Air Compressor
### Solicitation Reference Number
WS4110475206

### Tender Description
The Government of Canada invites interested Offerors to submit a bid for the supply and delivery of a high-pressure breathing air compressor to fill Self-Contained Breathing Apparatus (SCBA) bottles. 

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply and delivery of a single high-pressure breathing air compressor to fill SCBA bottles used in firefighting and emergency response operations.
* The contractor will be responsible for ensuring the quality and performance of the delivered equipment.
* The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and uses a competitive, open bidding process.

**Procurement Details:**

* [Opening Date: 2023-10-31 | Closing Date: 2023-11-17 14:00 EST]
* Solicitation Number: WS4110475206
* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: 2023-11-09
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-05
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-01-10
* Regions of Delivery: Edmonton, Alberta, Canada
* Contact Person: Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Government Notice
The Government of Canada reserves the right to reject any or all bids and to accept the bid that best represents the value to the Government, as well as any other conditions for acceptance.

### Pre-Amendment is hereby superseded for the Notice of Open Tendering.
A New Date and Time published in compilation: please disregard the arbitration posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 17 November 2023, 14:00 hours EST. 

### For any questions, contact the above-mentioned contact person Lyland Wiebe at lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

Do not hesitate to contact the above-mentioned contact if you have questions or need further clarification on the tender requirements.   
Above-mentioned information could be disposed as soon as 30-day-period is finished.
